title: French far-left party under fire after fatal attack on nationalist activist
summary_full: With just weeks to go before March’s municipal elections, the tragedy comes at a particularly damaging moment for Mélenchon’s far-left party
summary_public: With just weeks to go before March’s municipal elections, the tragedy comes at a particularly damaging moment for Mélenchon’s far-left party
